verbs.description: [ARG0: Education Secretary Betsy DeVos] [V: followed] [ARG1: Donald Trump 's footsteps] and enforced an anti - immigration policy by telling schools that they can choose to call Immigration and Customs Enforcement on potentially undocumented students .
